tategaki.description: Applies Vertical Right-to-Left (RTL) to your callout content.

vertical-ltr.description: Applies Vertical Left-to-Right (LTR) to your callout content.

color.description: Specify the target colour for callout title, content or both.

centre-text.description: Centre the callout title text, the callout content text or both.

text-direction.description: Centre the callout title text, the callout content text or both.

text-transform.description: Set text transform options within callout title, content or both.

extended-color-palette.description: Set the extended colour of choice to callout title, content or both.

ascii-art.description: Set customisable ASCII art in new tabs.

number-tabs.description: Numbers tabs within the same tab group. Works with Stacked Tabs as well.

filters.description: Sets the global contrast, brightness and saturation throughout Obsidian.

font-style.description: Set the font style of the callout title, content or both.

text-decoration.description: Sets the text decoration of callout title, content or both.

heading-title.description: Sets the callout title to inherit the target heading's styles in the theme.

font-weight.description: Sets the specified font weight as the default for callout title, content or both.

flashcard.description: Sets the callout to flashcard style. Hover to see callout content.

writing-mode.description: Sets writing mode which adds text indentation in callouts.

set-font.description: Set the target font in callout title, content or both.

lists.description: Set the default ordered and unordered list marker styling in callouts.

lucide-icons.description: Sets the callout icon to a specified lucide icon value.

grid-background.description: Sets a grid background in your callouts or as a cssclass.

dotted-background.description: Sets a dotted background in your callouts or as a cssclass.

rhombus-background.description: Sets a rhombus background in your callouts or as a cssclass.

smooth-cursor.description: Configures smooth cursor, supports built in vim mode.

extended-color.description: CSS variable definitions for the extended color palette. Used in extended color callouts snippet.

tui-callout.description: Styles callouts to resemble TUI interfaces.

plain-callout.description: Style callouts with an accented title background. Suitable for use in research or academic related notes

vertical-callout.description: Displays the callout title in a vertical manner.

tilt.description: Tilt the callout title, content, or both.

font-size-callout.description: Set the font size based on UI font size for callout title, content or both.

opacity-callout.description: Set the opacity of callout title, content or both in increments of 0.05.
